author: pat
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2020
review_content: Too expensive for the amount. I thought I was getting a larger box. I bought 2 boxes since and got them for less than what he charged me.  I would not recommend this seller.
title: Too expensive.

author: John H. Turner
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2018
review_content: So why is the box geared to children?  I have had bad arthritis days in my hands and lived on this cereal.  I have eaten It right out of the box when I ran out of milk.  Give this one a try.
title: The perfect adult cereal!

author: SDR
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
review_content: Cinnamon Toast Crunch, Cereal is so delicious.  I don’t normally eat cereal much anymore, but during the Pandemic, I thought I wanted to buy my old favorite for comfort food!  I need to stay away from this cereal because the first time I had my first bowl in years it turned out to be 2 bowls!  So awesome!
title: Cinnamon Toast Crunch - Great Taste

author: DREHS01
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
review_content: This product is difficult to get in stock. When I first established the subscribe and save, it was a good deal. The last time I purchased it, the price rose significantly and I missed the window to cancel. This will not happen again as I cancelled my subscription. Poor management of program on this product.
title: Shipping erratic and major price fluctuations

author: Rejuvenations Redesign & Staging
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2019
review_content: These were really good ! Too good in fact. There is more sugar than we normally use and if the ever make it sugar free so we can apply our own Splenda / I will happily eat it every morning. It’s delicious but the sugar is it’s downfall in our house
title: Delicious but too much sugar
